wikipedia_page.main: Connor Mark Waldon (born 13 February 1995) is an English footballer who is who plays for Swindon Supermarine. He made five league appearances professionally for Swindon Town

response: * 3 May 2013: Youth graduates Alex Ferguson, Mark Francis, Aaron Oakley, Louis Thompson and Connor Waldon are offered professional contracts.
*13 June 2014: It is confirmed that Jack Barthram and Connor Waldon have signed contract extensions and will remain with the club.
*  – The exits of Harry Agombar, Josue Antonio, George Barker, Jack Barthram, Matty Jones, Cameron Belford, Wes Foderingham, Darren Ward, Connor Waldon and Andy Williams were confirmed.
